Dataset: CHELSA_Present_bio (2020-09-05)

Category: Covariates

CHELSA Bioclimatic Variables

High-resolution climatic data for present-day bioclimatic analysis.

This dataset contains data with the following attributes:

  • Time Resolution: 1979-2013

  • Spatial Resolution: 1 km

  • DOI: 10.1038/sdata.2017.122

  • Link: https://chelsa-climate.org/bioclim/

Environment variables included:

$CHELSA_Present_bio_HOME Location: /anvil/datasets/Covariates/CHELSA_Present_bio $CHELSA_Present_bio_ROOT Location: /anvil/datasets/Covariates/CHELSA_Present_bio $CHELSA_Present_bio_VERSION Version: 2020-09-05

Tips: - Use echo $ENV_NAME to check the environment value. - To see all environment variables related to CHELSA_Present_bio, you can load the module then use: env | grep CHELSA_Present_bio - To unload the module and remove the environment settings: module unload CHELSA_Present_bio ————————————————————-
